spec_data.Name: bitlyclip
spec_data.Description:
bitlyclip is just a script that:

 - Takes a url in your clipboard.
 - Shortens it with the bit.ly url shortening service.
 - Puts the new url back in your clipboard.

It makes a nice 'hotkey' in whatever window manager you're using.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 03:49:57 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Shorten urls in the X clipboard with bit.ly
